subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Tuesday felt like spring training in that it was a warm up for the real thing, coming Feb. 13, when Roger Clemens and other members of the Syringe Generation report to Camp Oversight.
snippet: Tuesday felt like spring training in that it was a warm up for the real thing, coming Feb. 13, when Roger Clemens and other members of the Syringe Generation report to Camp Oversight.
